document.query: CREATE TABLE `gt_banner` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `priority` TINYINT(3) NOT NULL , `banner_page` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL , `deleted` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL , `from_date` DATE NOT NULL , `to_date` DATE NOT NULL , `created_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , `updated_at` DATETIME NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
